function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 perception leading to travel anxiety","Impact":"Influence on tourist vacation behavior and decision-making","Mitigation":"Improved safety measures, access to accurate information, mental health support","Technologies":"Health monitoring, contact tracing, vaccination tracking","People":"Tourists, travel industry workers, local communities","Owner":"Health organizations, travel companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Travel anxiety influencing travel plans","Impact":"Changes in travel behavior and destination choices","Mitigation":"Counseling, stress management techniques, flexible travel policies","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, digital health platforms","People":"Tourists, travel industry workers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, travel companies, mental health providers"}]}
